00060             inline std::pair<float, float> getCellCentroidXYPair(int cellID) {
00061                 std::pair<std::map<int, XYCoords>::iterator, bool> isInserted;
00062                 isInserted = cellIdtoCoords.insert(std::pair<int,XYCoords>(cellID,std::pair<float,float>(0, 0)));
00063                 if (isInserted.second == true) {
00064                     throw std::runtime_error("Error: cell " + std::to_string(cellID) + " is not valid");
00065                 }
00066                 return isInserted.first->second;
00067             }

00075             inline bool isInShowerInnerRing(int centroidId, int cellId) {
00076                 bool matched = false;
00077                 for (auto ringId : getInnerRingCellIds(centroidId)) {
00078                     if (cellId == ringId)
00079                         matched = true;
00080                 }
00081                 return matched;
00082             }
